title: PHPclassKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPclassKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Declare a class:
<?php
class MyClass {
public $number = 5;
}
$obj = new MyClass();
echo 
  $obj->number;
?>

Definition and Usage
The
class
keyword is used to create classes.
Related Pages
Read more about classes in our
PHP Classes and Objects Tutorial
.

★
+1

practice_exercises.title: Complete the Code 1
practice_exercises.description: Fill in the missing line to make this code work.
practice_exercises.starter_code:

public $number = 5;
# TODO: Complete this line

  $obj->number;

practice_exercises.solution:
<?php
class MyClass {
public $number = 5;
}
$obj = new MyClass();
echo 
  $obj->number;
?>
